summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to incur an indebtedness against the general fund of the City of Seattle for the purpose of improving Gilman Avenue, et al., from Fifteenth Avenue West to Eleventh Avenue West, by paving, etc., as authorized by Ordinance No. 38319, creating Local Improvement District No. 3136, appropriating money therefor, and declaring an emergency.
